author: .fjl
content: I have implemented the latest eth/69 proposal in Geth

author: .fjl
content: Can we figure out a timeline for testing?

author: .fjl
content: I think we should launch a basic devnet some time next week

author: .fjl
content: the clients don't need to fully utilize the new BlockRangeUpdate message to participate in this

author: .fjl
content: just implement the receipt and status message changes

author: .fjl
content: I can also just run a pruned node on Sepolia with eth/69 enabled, for interactive testing

author: .fjl
content: the hive eth protocol tests will also be updated for this, but note it's not super easy to test history expiry there

author: .fjl
content: I will just add some basic test vectors for invalid blockrangeupdate
